testcase.name: test_error_payment_credit_card_invalid_1

failure.message:
Expected: to find {'message': 'credit_card_number_invalid'} in the list of response but: was [{'message': 'credit_card_cvv_invalid', 'description': 'Credit card cvv must be 3 to 4 digits'}]
-------------------- >> begin captured stdout << ---------------------
REQUEST curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" https://lethe-testing.blacklane.io/payment_methods -d'{"request_uuid": "81cf2ba6-5b83-e540-5754-defbd14aaa6f", "user_uuid": "ee0ba106-6ef9-4ea1-9ab0-bd7de9ba1689", "credit_card_holder": "Cox", "credit_card_number": "4000111111111111", "credit_card_expiry_month": "08", "credit_card_expiry_year": 2023, "credit_card_cvv": 534}'
RESPONSE {'request_uuid': '81cf2ba6-5b83-e540-5754-defbd14aaa6f', 'errors': [{'message': 'credit_card_cvv_invalid', 'description': 'Credit card cvv must be 3 to 4 digits'}]}
